name.ch: 半導體製程設備與技術

goal.ch: 介紹並使學生了解半導體儀器與設備相關技術以及發展趨勢，並鏈結各工程領域與半導體產業之知識及人才。
goal.en: To understand the development and trend of advanced semiconductor processes and equipment, as well as knowledge and talents in the field of junction engineering and the semiconductor industry. This course is co-lectured by the TSMC team.
